Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Scone \Scone\, n. A cake, thinner than a bannock, made of wheat or barley or oat meal. [Written variously, {scon}, {skone}, {skon}, etc.] [Scot.] --Burns. [1913 Webster]
scone n : small biscuit (rich with cream and eggs) cut into diamonds or sticks and baked in an oven or (especially originally) on a griddle
